title: How to Find and Catch Mewtwo in Pokémon HeartGold and SoulSilver

steps.title: Defeat the Elite 4 and the champion, Lance.
steps.content: Defeat the Elite 4 and the champion, Lance.

steps.title: Get to Cerulean City and find Cerulean Cave.
steps.content: Get to Cerulean City and find Cerulean Cave. Remember the location of it.

steps.title: Defeat the rest of the gyms.
steps.content: Defeat the rest of the gyms.

steps.title: Go back to the cave and find your way through it.
steps.content: Go back to the cave and find your way through it.

steps.title: You'll see Mewtwo.
steps.content: You'll see Mewtwo. Go up and talk to it, then get ready to catch it.

steps.title: Stock up on Ultra Balls, Dusk Balls, and Timer Balls.
steps.content: Stock up on Ultra Balls, Dusk Balls, and Timer Balls.

steps.title: Get a Psychic Pokémon and a Steel Pokémon.
steps.content: Get a Psychic Pokémon and a Steel Pokémon.

steps.title: Battle Mewtwo until it's at less than 50 percent of its health.
steps.content: Battle Mewtwo until it's at less than 50 percent of its health.

steps.title: Throw your Ultra Balls and Dusk Bulls until it's caught.
steps.content: Throw your Ultra Balls and Dusk Bulls until it's caught. If the battle goes on for over 30 turns, throw your Timer Balls as well.
